sentences.en: A cage is an enclosure for birds.
I received your enclosure with gratitude.
the bear enclosure at the zoo
The dogs have greater freedom too, for they are allowed to wander outside their enclosure.
sentences.cn: 那些狗也有了较大的自由, 因为允许它们在栅栏外面到处跑跑.

sentences.en: The dogs have greater freedom, too, for they are allowed to wander outside their enclosure.
sentences.cn: 狗也有较多的自由，因为允许它们在围栏外边随便走动。

sentences.en: the enclosure of arable land for pasture
sentences.cn: 将耕地圈起来用作牧场

sentences.en: the enclosure of common land in the seventeenth century
The enclosure of public land meant that ordinary people couldn't use it.
sentences.cn: 公共土地的圈围意味着普通人将不能使用它.

sentences.en: The enclosure will reach you twice a year, don't refuse it.
sentences.cn: 信中附款,你每年将收到两次, 望勿拒绝.

sentences.en: The essential components of a microcomputerare often contained within single enclosure.
sentences.cn: 微型计算机的基本部件常组装在同一箱体中.

sentences.en: The house was confined by an enclosure.
sentences.cn: 这房子用篱笆围了起来.

sentences.en: The supporting case is the outer enclosure of the gyro component.
sentences.cn: 支承壳体是陀螺组件的外壳.

sentences.en: There is a public enclosure of a racecourse.
sentences.cn: 那儿有个作赛马场的公共圈地.

sentences.en: Thereupon she made hay of the weighing - in enclosure.
sentences.cn: 这样一来,她可把这个骑师休息场给扰乱了.

sentences.en: This enclosure was so vast that the outermost wall could hardly be seen.
sentences.cn: 这块围场如此之大，几乎看不见最远端的围墙。

sentences.en: This is used to indicate the temperature of the enclosure.
sentences.cn: 这个用来指示壳体的温度.

sentences.en: We were led to a fenced enclosure.
sentences.cn: 我们被带到一处用篱笆围住的场地.

words.tran_cn: 附上（enclose的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 密围式搭建物；密围式构筑物
浴室隔板；淋浴房；淋浴间

trans.tran_en: an area surrounded by a wall or fence, and used for a particular purpose
